title.rendered: Saratoga Springs High School DECA Club Holds Job Fair

content.rendered:
The Saratoga Springs High School DECA club hosted a successful job fair, connecting students with over a dozen local businesses for summer job opportunities! It was a fantastic opportunity for students to gain valuable experience and explore local career paths.

A huge thank you to the following businesses and organizations that participated. Your support and involvement are invaluable in providing our students with valuable summer job opportunities.

  • Impressions of Saratoga & The Dark Horse Mercantile
  • Cudney’s Cleaners
  • Saratoga Springs Recreation Dept
  • Wilton Rec Department
  • Saratoga YMCA
  • Country Corner Café
  • Kyak Shak
  • Go Kids
  • Saratoga Springs Children’s Museum
  • G Willikers Toys
  • Kings Brothers Dairy
  • Saratoga Senior Center
  • Hop on Home
  • The Wesley Community
  • National Museum of Racing
  • Thorn & Roots
  • Fasig Tipton
  • Hattie’s Saratoga
  • Wilton AIM Services
